mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS WHERE BOARDNUM = #{boardNum} ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC , UPDATEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (COMMENTNUM, BOARDNUM, MEMBERNUM, CONTENT, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (COMMENTNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardNum}, #{memberNum}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE COMMENTNUM = #{commentNum} ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC , UPDATEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLYNUM, COMMENTNUM, MEMBERNUM, CONTENT, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{commentNum}, #{memberNum}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS WHERE COMMENTNUM = #{commentNum} AND MEMBERNUM = #{memberNum}
